name: dbgate
tagline: A database management IDE for SQL, NoSQL, and file-based data sources
description: DbGate is a modern database management tool with a web-based IDE for SQL, JSON, and CSV. It supports many database types like PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, and SQLite. Easy to deploy in Docker for self-hosting.

features.title: Rich Text Editor
features.description: Full-featured SQL editor in your browser. Code anywhere, anytime

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Export to JSON, CSV, and other formats easily. Flexible data handling

features.title: Schema Management
features.description: View and modify database structures visually. Intuitive database design

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Run your database management tool privately. Complete control and security
